Title: 游뒆 Mohammad Javad Zarif confirmed on his X account that one of th...
Description: Mohammad Javad Zarif confirmed on his X account that one of the reasons for his resignation was the objections to his children's foreign citizenship, and at the same time he added that no institution opposed his appointment as deputy leader. A peculiarity of the law approved in 1401, they had turned my employment in sensitive jobs into an excuse to put pressure on the 14th government - and he also resigned from the strategic deputy position of physicians last week to avoid any suspicions or excuses for disrupting the work of the government.
